<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Crushing Leaps](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2276)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 139 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 80 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This supple, light wooden wand drifts to the ground like a feather or leaf when dropped, landing unharmed. A thin coil of metal wraps around the wand's handle.

<document level="2" id="action-1823" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of 1st-level _jump_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wand of Crushing Leaps
